messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Mario Galaxi-WASKids and money
messages.msgSnippet: Oh well for the sale. I am not getting up at 3 AM to go to a sale and stand outside when is 17  degrees waiting for the store to open. I rather pay $15 dollars
messages.messageBody:
Oh well for the sale. I am not getting up at 3 AM to go to a sale and stand outside when is 17 degrees waiting for the store to open.
I rather pay $15 dollars more. Anyways we have pre-ordered because MD has been dying to play it for months.
Hey Count Black was not that hard! But them again MD always did the bosses for me <BWG>
Yes Mario Galaxi is lots of fun!
You guys really need to come over here and spend some time with us!!!!!!!!!
Alex




----- Original Message ----
From: Melissa <autismhelp@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, November 21, 2007 12:00:38 PM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Mario Galaxi-WASKids and money

Yes! we bought it too, and it has been wonderful for all age groups
in our family. Josh of course, has already beaten it (and I'm still
working on beating Count Bleck in Paper Mario, grrr, but I have my
own file on Galaxy as well) News is that Friday after thanksgiving,
either circuit city or best buy will have it for $35.

Melissa
Mom to Josh (12), Breanna (10), Emily (8), Rachel (7), Sam (6), Dan
(4), and Avari Rose (19 months)

share our lives at
http://360.yahoo com/multimomma

On Nov 21, 2007, at 11:20 AM, BRIAN POLIKOWSKY wrote:

> We are having a ball playing MArio Galaxi/. It is too much fun
> ( specially for me I think!) MD has taken a break from it to play
> Paper Mario Game Cube because he is almost completed the game and I
> think he want to beat it since he is so close to it.
> I recomend thsi game for all ages of playes. It is super fun and
> you can "help" by playing with a second controler. My ds is only 5
> and it is fun.
> Alex

>
>

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Mario Galaxi-WASKids and money
messages.msgSnippet: We are having a ball playing MArio Galaxi/. It is too much fun ( specially for me I think!) MD has taken a break from it to play Paper Mario Game Cube because
messages.messageBody:
We are having a ball playing MArio Galaxi/. It is too much fun ( specially for me I think!) MD has taken a break from it to play Paper Mario Game Cube because he is almost completed the game and I think he want to beat it since he is so close to it.
I recomend thsi game for all ages of playes. It is super fun and you can "help" by playing with a second controler. My ds is only 5 and it is fun.
Alex


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
